Krystian

Height:
5'10" (177 cm)

Introduction

Krystian Wang, also known as Wang Nanjun, is a Chinese singer, songwriter, and model. He used to be a member of the global pop group, Now United. He is also known for participating in survival shows "Youth With You 3" (2021) and "Boys Planet" (2022).

active
